name: SHAPES4
description:
Shapes 4 is a little puzzle game where you have to draw a certain shape using a limited number of moves.

The goal is to draw each level's shape in just one move - that means that going over the same line more than once is not allowed! There are lots of different shapes that make levels in this game, some of them are easier to draw, and some of them not so much easy.

You are also allowed to use some hints on each level - but where's the fun in that?

Calculate your moves, watch where you put your lines and beat this game like a draw pro!
